sourcesContent:
import"./Cart.css" import{cartInfo}from"../../data/cart" const Cart=()=>{ return(
Your Cart Shop
{cartInfo.map(item=>
Title:{item?.title}
Author:{item?.author}
{item?.quantity}
${item?.price*item?.quantity}
)}
Order Summary
Subtotal: ${cartInfo.reduce((total,cur)=>total+cur.price*cur.quantity,0)}
Shop coast: ${cartInfo.reduce((total,cur)=>0,0)}
) } export default Cart;
